description.en: In 2315 AD, the "Young Girl Supervision Law" and the "Demand Improvement Law" prevailed, and everything related to cute things was forbidden! The world's largest villain organization, the leader of the allied forces, the world's most adorable girl! Adauf Loma was "saved" by the genius Kano by accident. From then on, Kano became Adauf's personal "slave" and fled with the cute army, and began his own life of slavery…QQ fan group number 339285255
